thread.title: China Open in Beijing: Sania Mirza, Martina Hingis enter semi-finals
thread.title_full: China Open in Beijing: Sania Mirza, Martina Hingis enter semi-finals - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: China Open in Beijing: Sania Mirza, Martina Hingis enter semi-finals
text: 8 Oct 2015Eyeing their eighth title of the season, Indian tennis ace Sania Mirza and her Swiss partner Martina Hingis entered the semi-finals of the China Open in Beijing today. The top seeds managed to prevail over the German-Czech pair of Julia Goerges and Karolina Pliskova 7-6, 6-4 in their quarterfinal match. Â»
